page.title: 12EMPLOYMENT TODAY
page.content: {We sent a survey round to ask what {type of jobs people did.Our results {are as follows:- Practical/Manual=16;Education=13; Manager,Health Service=12; Factory,Director,Sales Rep/Marketing, Engineer=11;Civil servant,Local Gorvernment=10;Farmer/Farm Workers=9; Driver, social worker= 7;Miner, cook kitchens = 4;Surveyor= 3;Home worker shop keeper/worker computers=2; Grapic desigher, exhibition organiser: company secretary, insurance jeweller Exhibition coordinator =1; TV Editor, Postal Tax Inspector,Bank Manager Warehouse Supervisor,Autioneer.
